title: TSP-40-SubmitTicketDetails Response Schema
description: Schema for RMP response to submission of ticket details. Receipt Id is a unique value generated each time this API is called.

requestId.description: Unique Id for this booking. Taken from the request payload.

receiptId.description: A unique Id generated by the TSP to identify receipt of these ticket details. A v4 UUID will be used.

bookingId.description: Booking ID OR Itinerary Number issued by the GDS (Global distribution systems - travel networking systems used by travel agencies)

locatorCode.description: The Computer reservation system (CRS) creates a Record Locator also know as a PNR (Passenger Name Record) OR Booking Reference
